text: "With Arms Wide Open" is a power ballad and is the third single off American rock band Creed's second studio album Human Clay. The song was released on April 24, 2000. The song won a Grammy Award for Best Rock Song at the 43rd Annual Grammy Awards in 2001. It was also nominated for Best Rock Vocal Performance by a Duo or Group but lost to U2's "Beautiful Day". ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2000 songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs Category:Creed (band) songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs Category:Rock ballads
title: With Arms Wide Open
